about.title: About me
about.subtitle: My Approach as a Developer
about.description: I turn complex ideas into robust and efficient digital solutions. I specialize in creating the secure and scalable core that your application needs, using key technologies such as Node.js and TypeScript.
about.description2: My commitment is to deliver maintainable code that not only solves problems today but also drives the future growth of your project, ensuring seamless integration with the frontend.
about.creativeDescription: I approach every project with a creative mindset, looking for innovative ways to tackle challenges and deliver unique solutions.
about.collaborativeDescription: I strongly believe that the best results come from teamwork. I enjoy collaborating with developers, product managers, and stakeholders.
about.constantDescription: I am committed to professional growth, constantly seeking to expand my skills and knowledge to stay at the forefront of the industry.

resume.subtitle: Working Experience
resume.workDescriptionOne: 'Developed and maintained web applications using React and Node.js.', 'Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated with various third-party services such as Google APIs.', 'Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.'
resume.workDescriptionTwo: Responsible for implementing interface logic and optimizing design for different devices, using tools such as JavaScript, CSS3, Tailwind, and functional methodologies.

studies.title: Studies
studies.studyDescriptionOne: Acquire and master the fundamentals of programming, while learning to organize and structure your code following the best practices of the JavaScript language.
studies.studyDescriptionTwo: Learn and understand Node.js programming from scratch with practical examples and exercises.
studies.studyDescriptionThree: Master the design, creation, and management of SQL databases efficiently using the MySQL database management system.
studies.studyDescriptionFour: Learn NoSQL with MongoDB from scratch, without prior knowledge, and perform Queries, relationships, data schemas, and CRUD.
studies.studyDescriptionFive: Learn HTML and CSS without any prior knowledge for the development, modification, and visualization of web elements.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Check out some of my projects

lifePost.title: LifePost
lifePost.description: LifePost is an application designed to provide inspiration and motivation, as well as a sanctuary where people can freely express themselves.
lifePost.longDescription: A space where everyone has the opportunity to share their stories with the world.

ImageOptimizator.title: Image Optimizator
ImageOptimizator.description: It is an MVC application designed to optimize and compress images, utilizing the JavaScript runtime environment Node.js and Express.js.
ImageOptimizator.longDescription: Optimize your images for your projects and websites.

listUserApi.title: listuser-api
listUserApi.description: listuser-api is a mini API created for a technical test. Provides user management through functionalities such as user creation, listing, updating, and deletion.
listUserApi.longDescription: listuser provides an efficient and easy way to manage and list users.

listuser.title: listuser
listuser.description: listuser is an application created to display the views of the listuser-api. It provides user management such as creating, listing, updating and deleting users.
listuser.longDescription: The main objective of Listuser is to demonstrate an efficient and simple way of how the listuser-api works in real-time.
